title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 81.5 - Return of bond
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 81.5 - Return of bond

State Regulations

Where a license or permit has been issued by the
authority, the bond filed in support of the license or permit shall not be
returned to the licensee or permittee. A bond may not be returned even though
the license or permit was immediately surrendered for cancellation and refund
and was never actually used. A bond filed in support of a license or permit may
be returned only to a person whose application was disapproved or disapproved
without prejudice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
81.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
